name: Stanford Security Reading Group
body:
We like to read and discuss interesting security-related papers. At least once a week. You should join us. It's lots of fun.

### Time & location

Tuesdays 4PM in Gates.

### Papers

Jan 20: [Automating Application Security for Cloud Services](http://sns.cs.princeton.edu/docs/passe-sp14-final.pdf) by Aaron Blankstein and Michael J. Freedman. [Deian]

Jan 27: [Virtual Ghost: Protecting Applications from Hostile Operating Systems](http://sva.cs.illinois.edu/pubs/VirtualGhost-ASPLOS-2014.pdf) by John Criswell, Nathan Dautenhahn, and Vikram Adve. [TBA]
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
